main.name: Katya Juliet
main.description: I am a leader in communication, digital technology & project management.
main.bio: I am a certified full-stack developer from UC Berkeley and designer with years of experience in technical project management and consulting. I graduated with honors from UC Davis with a B.A in Communication, focusing on digital media, negotiation, confirmation bias & consumer behaviors. I am curious, honest, efficient, creative and extremely motivated. I believe that communication, authenticity & world-class customer experience is key for success. I am also wildly interested in Augmented Reality, App development and love helping others bring their ideas to life!
main.contactmessage: I would love to learn more about you and partner together for exceptional results!

resume.skillmessage: MERN Developer • Front / Back end Dev • HTML • CSS • Javascript • Jquery • Bootstrap • NodeJS • JEST  • REACT • Wireframing • Graphic Design • Video & Audio Production • Small Business Consulting • Team & Communication leadership

education.description: 6-month intensive bootcamp with UC Berkeley for Full-Stack Development hybrid course.
Graduated with honors from UC Davis with a B.A in Communication, with focus on digital media & consumer behaviors.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer & Designer
work.description: Programming, website and mobile app development, graphic design, video and podcast editing, marketing, technical project management and more. Clients range across a variety of industries. PM Leadership of a team of developers and designers.

testimonials.text: Remarkable, professional, and a delight to work and consult with. Making the decision to hire Katya Lerner was the right call for our Book Cover designs, websites, marketing and more!
Thanks for your commitment Katya… we hope you know how valued you are. I think you are brilliant and am in awe of your time management skills alone. Wish I had them.
testimonials.user: Christine Merser, Creator, Blue Shoe Content
